subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: An early contender for the N.F.L.’s rookie of the year award, Adrian Peterson is drawing rave reviews from teammates and opponents but has not forgotten his roots in Palestine, Tex.
snippet: An early contender for the N.F.L.’s rookie of the year award, Adrian Peterson is drawing rave reviews from teammates and opponents but has not forgotten his roots in Palestine, Tex.
